name: Kenneth Zimny
intro: A versatile developer specializing in frontend, full-stack, and embedded systems, I have successfully developed and deployed diverse projects, showcasing adaptability and cross-disciplinary expertise. With experience in launching high-security web applications for leading enterprises, I take ownership of high-impact features, enhancing user experience and meeting business objectives. Additionally, I hold CompTIA Security+ and AWS Cloud Practitioner certifications, and have thrived in various roles, including as a sole developer, business owner, and team member.
